com.foreach.across.modules.hibernate.unitofwork

Interface UnitOfWorkFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeUnitOfWorkFactory, JpaUnitOfWorkFactoryImpl, UnitOfWorkFactoryImpl

    public interface UnitOfWorkFactory

    A unit of work factory facilitates managing one or more sessions, without having to explicitly know about the sessions themselves.

    A UnitOfWorkFactory can be used to determine the open session/entity manager demarcations.

    See Also:
    OpenSessionInViewInterceptor, OpenEntityManagerInViewInterceptor

      void restart()
      When called, this will close and reopen all Sessions attached to the current thread.
      UnitOfWork start()
      Starts a new unit of work: opens all Sessions.
      void stop()
      Stops the unit of work: closes all Sessions.
